channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: C’est toujours la panade pour l’Apple Vision Pro
item.description: Le lancement discret d'une nouvelle version plus puissante du Vision Pro cette année n'y aura pas suffi : le casque de réalité mixte d'Apple ne se vendrait pas au niveau espéré par le constructeur. Ce dernier aurait d'ailleurs réduit le budget pub de… 95 %.

item.title: Ces 5 voitures électriques qui ont frôlé la catastrophe à leur lancement : roues qui se détachent, pannes de clim, freinage d’urgence, etc.
item.description: Lancer un nouveau produit sur le marché n'est jamais chose aisée. Pour les constructeurs automobiles, les voitures électriques représentent un challenge supplémentaire, avec parfois quelques déconvenues lors des débuts. Voici quelques modèles qui ont eut des débuts plutôt chaotiques.

item.title: Sunderland vs Man City live streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Sunderland vs Man City live streams from anywhere in the world as Haaland and co look to continue their run of Premier League wins.

item.title: How to watch Red Eye season 2 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Hana Li (Jing Lusi) has no option but to navigate a political incident with Martin Compston's spiky head of security Clay. Here's how to watch Red Eye season 2 online.

item.title: Amazon just launched a massive winter sale — clearance prices on TVs, Fitbit, AirPods and more
item.description: Amazon just launched a massive winter sale with clearance prices on TVs, smartwatches, Apple devices, kitchen appliances, vacuums, and more.

item.title: Scandale des « bikini deepfakes » : l’IA d’Elon Musk détournée pour déshabiller des mineures et des femmes
item.description: Depuis quelques jours, le fil X est inondé de photos de femmes « déshabillées » par Grok. Le chatbot, sous prétexte de « liberté d'expression » et de refus de la censure « woke », a ouvert les vannes au grand n'importe quoi.

item.title: Public domain 2026: Betty Boop, Pluto, and Nancy Drew set free
item.description: Some years ago, I was writing a science fiction short story in which I wanted to incorporate verses from a 1928 song, "Button Up Your Overcoat." However, when I sold the story, my editor told me that since the song was still copyrighted, it was safer not to include the verses. If I had written […]

item.title: Get the next 12 months of cybersecurity and streaming sorted with this discounted Norton VPN deal
item.description: Norton offers a plethora of security tools for 2026 from only $2.50 a month thanks to this VPN deal exclusively available to TechRadar readers.

item.title: Hack PS5 : ces lignes de code pourraient être un cauchemar pour Sony, voici pourquoi
item.description: C'est une avalanche de données brutes. Depuis quelques heures, des centaines de clés hexadécimales circulent sur la scène du hack PS5. Elles proviendraient directement du processeur de la console. Mais avant de penser "jeux gratuits" et "jailbreak", il faut comprendre ce que sont ces chiffres.

item.title: Écran QHD+ 240 Hz, RTX 5070 Ti, Ryzen AI 7 : le puissant laptop gamer HP Omen Max 16 devient plus séduisant avec 500 € en moins
item.description: Avec son processeur puissant, sa carte graphique récente et son écran offrant une fluidité exemplaire, le HP Omen Max 16 se comporte très bien au centre d'un solide setup. Bonne nouvelle, son prix passe de 2 499,90 euros à 1 999,90 euros chez Grosbill.

item.title: New Year's sales are live — here are 75 deals I'd buy from Amazon, Apple, Fitbit, and more
item.description: New Year's sales are live, and I'm rounding up over 100 hand-picked deals from Apple, Amazon, Fitbit, Best Buy, and more.

item.title: Pick up a four-pack of AirTags for only $65 right now
item.description:
Most Apple products are pretty expensive, but some of the most affordable (and useful) ones are AirTags. The Bluetooth trackers are priced pretty reasonably even when not on sale, but they can be a steal if you can get them on a discount — like right now. A four pack of AirTags is on sale for $65 at Amazon, which is only a few dollars more than the record-low price we saw during Black Friday a couple of months ago.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go....

item.title: Goodbye, brain rot – I'm ditching my smartphone for this tiny ereader in 2026, here's why
item.description: Can an ereader do everything a phone can? I found out by giving the Boox Palma 2 Pro a whirl, comparing its features to those of my Android phone.

item.title: JBL’s new flagship Dolby Atmos soundbar is one of the year's best — here are 3 reasons why I’d buy it
item.description: The JBL Bar 1300MK2 is a powerful, versatile, and excellent-sounding Dolby Atmos soundbar, and it's all too easy to recommend.

item.title: Airloom will showcase its new approach to wind power at CES
item.description: One of the many concerns about artificial intelligence these days is how the rush to build data centers is impacting local communities. Data centers can create a drain on resources, and some utility companies have already said customers can expect to see their electricity bills growing as these facilities increase demand. There have been some discussions of what other power sources could support the AI engine, and wind power specialist Airloom is one company that's looking to address the problem. Ahead of the business' upcoming appearance at CES, we've learned a bit about what Airloom has acco...
